h1_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes
content: As you enter Fright Cliff from Sandgate Village, make your way up the hill toward the Squall Hideout Keeper’s Shrine. Before you reach it, you’ll go past the chanting Buddha Head on your right. Each one of the Buddha Heads has glowing yellow eyes. Interact with it to remove the Buddha’s Eyeball.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Buddha's_Eyes_Locations_and_Unlock_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes' and the sub-subsection 'Buddha’s Eyes 1'.
The content is as follows:
As you enter Fright Cliff from Sandgate Village, make your way up the hill toward the Squall Hideout Keeper’s Shrine. Before you reach it, you’ll go past the chanting Buddha Head on your right. Each one of the Buddha Heads has glowing yellow eyes. Interact with it to remove the Buddha’s Eyeball.
